name: Maze Traversal
description:
A and D keys to move.

Space to bolt.

ESC to close.

No goal just maze.

The algorithm used to generate the maze is my own.  It's not necessarily the most efficient, but it is the most simple and clean one I've come across.  It works better in a fixed space, so the nature of this game got in the way a bit.

The first screenshot is the original application of my algorithm.   It made a text document.
